Mixed List Content


List With Paragraphs

  • First item with a longer description that might wrap.
  • Second item.
    Additional paragraph in same item.
  • Third item back to normal.

List With Code

  • Run npm install first
  • Then npm run build
  • Finally npm start

List With Multiple Formatting

  • Bold and italic and code all together
  • Normal then bold nested italic bold end
  • Mix of link and code

Ordered With Sub-lists

  1. Main step one
    • Detail A
    • Detail B
  2. Main step two
    1. Sub-step 2.1
    2. Sub-step 2.2
  3. Main step three

Empty And Single Char Items

  • A
  • B
  • C

List After Paragraph

  • Another item
And text after the list.
